name: Satori Consulting

overview:
Satori Consulting Inc. provides customized and comprehensive, professional services focused in user- centered research, testing and design for products and applications for mid market and enterprise clients.
Our team is comprised of usability professionals with over 10 years experience in preparation, facilitation and evaluation of usability testing results.
